title: Low priority que
body:
I am new here so I want to ask, does anyone think that the way low priority queue is activated is a little too specific?

Consider the following:
I just played a game and had to leave at (I think it was 40 minutes) and before I left I,
#1 This was a normal game, not a draft pick or a ranked.
#2 Let everyone know I was.
#3 Charge mid with a successful reckless assault
#4 allowed my team to charge to victory (hats of to kled)

"Leaver buster automatically suspends you if you leave match made games early"
I would assume that pushing to the enemy base at the end of the match then having to leave in a normal would be okay.
But even though we won and I was not needed for the ending the game experience I still get low priority queue since I left. Fair enough.

from riot support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h1q2
"No, your account will not be banned. However, it is possible to be punished for leaving just 1-2 games. Players who leave games will be placed in a low priority queue and will be required to play 5 matchmade games without leaving before exiting low priority queue."

Can the timer for the que be updated come the new season?


I could do like I normally do and make a well thought out argument but while writing this I am running for this ban so I hope this is enough to get consideration from the devs.

]\'[
